name: Fluper
description:
Clutch Notification: Attempt to Inflate Reviews
We have evidence that someone has recently attempted to artificially inflate the rating and number of reviews of this service provider. We have done our best to address the issue but please use your best judgment when evaluating this company.
 
✔ We Build Fluid Apps: Affordable & Rapid Web & Mobile App Design & Development Agency (2 Million App User Engagement)
✔ Engaging & Disrupting IT Industry by provisioning “most affordable” IT Service Solutions energizing Individuals, Startups, SMEs and Enterprises to transform all into Million Dollar Companies to reach the mission of Fortune 500 Companies with Our Specialized Consultation and Dedicated Guidance.
Benefits:
★ 350+ Hard Core Filtered Tech Expertise.
★ 30% off on Every Mobile App Designed & Developed.
★ “100 + 10”% Refund (Instant) - No Excuses/Demands.
★ Estimation & Business Analysis @ 0 Cost.
★ 9 Months App Marketing & Promotions @ 0 Cost.
★ 2.5 Years App Maintenance & Support.
★ Complete Source Code/IPR Rights (Live Coding through Bit Bucket).
★ 24*7 Real Time Tracking & Project Management.
★ Dedicated Team Allocation.
★ Penalty Enforcement – In case of delivery delay.
★ Fixed Prices- No Hidden Charges/Cost Plan Shared in Advance. 
Specialties: Web App Designing, Mobile App Designing, Web App Dev, Mobile App Dev, E-Commerce App Dev, CMS Dev, ERP Apps Development, Android App Dev, iOS App Dev, PHP Development, .Net Development, Java Development.
Verticals Covered: Block chain,AR/VR, Chatbots, Tours and Travels, Finance, Health, Education, News & Media, Lifestyle, Music, Maps & Navigation, Social Networking, Payment Systems, On Demand Services, Augment Reality, Wearable & iOT.
READ MORE...
